entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0154.10070] The filer has reported a value for base erosion and anti abuse tax that is not using the element defined in the US-GAAP taxonomy. The FASB has added elements for the BEAT percentage amount and the BEAT monetary amount in the 2022 taxonomy. These elements are:
1. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationBeatPercent 2. EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationBeatAmount
The element lite:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationBEATAdjustmentNetAmount with the label "BEAT" has been used in the filing in the disclosure section "9954534 - Disclosure - Income Taxes - Effective Tax Rate Reconciliation (Details)" that should be updated to the appropriate US-GAAP element listed above.
Rule Element Id:10070 Rule version: 26.0.9 -
